roleset.name: coming to possess/become acquainted with

roles.note: args 3-price and 4-secondary attribute omitted due to expected lack of need in nominalizations.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on receive-v.01, noun corpus. Corresponds to VNcls obtain-13.5.2.

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: So far , the critical reception for cyber-literature in book form has not been great

example.name: arg0
example.text: she did not really get too much of a reception from Bashar Al - Assad in terms of lightening the traditionally antagonistic Syrian align towards Israel .

example.name: MNR
example.text: I think I will get a very positive reception .

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: After reception of the package from the other school, a debriefing session is organized to discover and analyze their artworks.
example.note: this assumes that arg1 and arg2 are not treed into a single node. If "the package from the other school" is treed as a single constituent, just tag it arg1.
